hero.subtitle: A unified ecosystem that automates restaurant management. Move from chaos to system.

items.title: Stop Losing Customers
items.desc: Is your staff slow to respond on Direct? Customers don't wait; they go to competitors. Our bots react instantly to retain your guests.

items.title: Smart Menu Presentation
items.desc: The bot doesn't just say hello. It sends the menu, provides dish information, and guides the guest through their selection.

items.title: Precise Reminders
items.desc: Guests won't forget their reservation. The system automatically sends alerts: 'Your reservation is at 23:00'.

items.title: Mobile Control
items.desc: Complete management from your smartphone. Your entire restaurant is in your pocket.

items.question: How long does it take to set up the system?
items.answer: The system is cloud-based, so setup takes just 1 day. Our team inputs the menu and trains your staff.

items.question: Does the system work if the internet goes down?
items.answer: Yes, thanks to PWA technology, the system can perform key functions offline and synchronizes data as soon as the connection is restored.

items.question: What is the payment model?
items.answer: We operate on a subscription model (SaaS). You can pay monthly or annually. There are no hidden commissions.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption (256-bit SSL), and your data is automatically backed up every day.
